body.name: GNCC Dog Camera with Phone APP, 1080P Pet Camera Indoor Security Baby Camera, 2-Way Audio, Motion Detection and Tracking, Night Vision, Real-Time Alerts, 355° Pan (Manual Up/Down), 2.4GHz Only (P1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 17 mins
features: 🐶【1080P Resolution & Remote Viewing】 With GNCC pet camera, stay tension-free all the time! Remote Viewing with a 1080P resolution enables you to keep a check on your pet even from far away all the time. You can control the GNCC pet camera with phone app to pan 355° horizontally (Manually Up and down) via the Osaio APP. Have peace of mind no matter where you are!❣️GNCC pet camera only works with 2.4GHz WiFi (5GHz is not supported)❣️

🐾【Motion/Sound Detection & Real-time Alert】 Get notified on your phone for every movement and sound of your pet! The built-in siren and motion/sound sensor of the GNCC pet camera give you a full sense of security. Once the GNCC dog camera with phone app detects motion or sound, it will follow and record the movement, and send an instant notification to your phone via the Osaio APP. GNCC pet camera with phone app helps you to remember every precious moment of your pet!

🌟【Infrared Night Vision & Two-Way Audio】 Be with your pet at all times, no matter day or night! With 6pcs 850nm infrared lights, the GNCC pet camera with phone app displays a clear image up to 26ft even in low light conditions. Equipped with a built-in microphone and speaker, the GNCC dog camera with phone app allows you to interact with your pet at any place via the Osaio APP. Works with Alexa, GNCC pet camera provides you with more convenient ways to use!

⛅【Optional Micro SD Card & Cloud Storage】 Coming with double storage options, secure your data either with Micro SD Card or Cloud storage! After inserting a Micro SD card (not included) into the GNCC pet camera, it can record videos continuously and store them into the micro SD card. The GNCC pet camera supports micro SD cards up to 128GB. You can also choose to subscribe to the Cloud service to avoid losing cherished video clips!

🎁【Easy Setup & Multi-device Sharing】 Easy to set up, the GNCC pet camera is an ideal gift for those unfamiliar with Internet technology. GNCC dog camera with phone app supports multiple devices to view the monitoring situation. Sharing the GNCC pet camera with your family members and enjoying the convenience GNCC pet camera brings to you!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,011 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q&A Q: Does the camera support 5G Wi-Fi? A: No, it can only work with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi. For a stable connection, the distance between the camera and router should better be close. Q: Can I rotate the camera remotely with the app? A: P1 can control it to rotate left and right on the APP, and it needs to be rotated manually up and down. Q: Why the screen of the Security Camera is upside down? A: Maybe you flip the Security Camera up on the ceiling, please turn on "Rotate Image" in the ‘Audio & Video’ of the settings. Q: Why the Indoor Camera can't record video to my SD Card? A: Maybe your SD Card isn't identified by the Camera, please change your SD card to 8-64GB, and format it in FAT 32. Q: Does the camera support multiple accounts to view at the same time? A: Yes, you can invite your family members and friends to register an Osaio account, then enter their Osaio account’s email address to share them with the camera. (You cannot log into the same account on different devices.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Darn Good
reviews.reviewText: Simple. Monitor your pets while away or catch an intruder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it's job well
reviews.reviewText: I had to use this for the holidays to keep track of my cats. It was always working when I checked and never looked bad. My only "complaint" is that it has a bit of lag when first changing directions for the camera, but I could chop that up to my phone lagging as well. Plus, it's technology using internet, it's gotta have time to catch up. Overall, a very good camera. Came in really handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was going on a short weekend trip with my family and wanted to be able to watch my pet while being away. I found this little camera on Amazon, at a great price and with good reviews. so, I went ahead and bought it.The camera comes with a set of instructions, and a USB power adapter with approximately 6' of USB cable. To quickly test the camera operation, you will first plug in the camera and download the Osaio app as instructed in the manual. The app will take you through a registration process, and it will give you step by step instructions to add the proper camera model (P1) and then connect to your Wi-Fi network. You use the app to operate the camera using Wi-Fi, move the lens to different angles, change the motion and night vision settings, listen to the surroundings and use the microphone on your device to speak. I would recommends moving as far as possible from the camera while doing the tests to avoid hearing noisy feedback from your device's mic when it is too close to the camera speaker. Once you are comfortable with the location and operation of the camera, you have to decide whether or not you want to record any video.The camera has several options to record video:- Using your mobile device's video recording: You have to manually activate the recording through the mobile device using the app; the video obtained from the camera will record to your mobile device. This is not the optimal option because it has to be activated manually, and it consumes significant storage space from your device.- Using a MicroSD card (not included): The camera has a MicroSD slot right below the lens. I would recommend placing a 64Gb or larger MicroSD storage card. With the MicroSD card inserted, you can record live video 24x7. When storage runs out, it will start overwriting on top of the oldest recordings on a continuous loop; no need to replace or add more storage.- Using Osaio's cloud storage - This is a paid option, and it offers some additional services to the customer depending on how much you pay.I purchased and added a MicroSD card to record video and audio. When I go out of town, I use my app with my mobile phone to watch my cat live and talk to him. I can also control the camera angle, zoom in and out and take quick snapshots or short videos from the app while I watch him. In addition, I can rewind to an earlier time to check on him at specific times, like when he's running to get his food at different times throughout the day. I can do this from anywhere at any time. Night vision works great as well. The camera detects light levels and sets the proper brightness automatically according to lighting.I highly recommend this camera. It has all the basic features you need to view and record; it is simple to set up and use and it is quite reliable. The capability of using it from anywhere (from home or any other city) using a mobile device is one of the most useful features in my opinion.

Bellissima telecamera 360, ottima qualita video in tutto e per tutto. L'app dedicata molto facile da capire e ottima nella prima installazione della telecamera. Reattività alta e veloce al cambio di inquadratura e repentina nel riconoscimento dei movimenti e del suono. Consigliatissima!
Preisleisung und Qualität super kann ich nur empfehlen
Très belle petite caméra fonctionne très bien et très facile à installer
